snippet: The family of the former Formula One test driver Maria de Villota said her death Friday was linked to the severe injuries she received in a crash last year.
abstract: Family of Formula One test driver Maria de Villota says her death is linked to injuries she received in 2013 crash in 2012; other racing news noted.

byline.original: By AGENCE FRANCE-PRESSE and THE ASSOCIATED PRESS

lead_paragraph: The family of the former Formula One test driver Maria de Villota said her death Friday was linked to the severe injuries she received in a crash last year.
